name: Dudley Public Art Heritage Trail (Wolverton Road Trail)

ai.summary: A short, 2.6 km easy urban trail along Wolverton Road in Dudley, exploring public art and local heritage with a gentle, family-friendly pace.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily paved sidewalks with gentle gradients; city streets, park sections, and a few uneven spots near crossings. Expect routine urban surroundings with opportunities to view sculptures and art along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Walk with care at road crossings; obey pedestrian signals; stay on designated paths; watch for cyclists and other pedestrians; weather-appropriate footwear; carry water and a phone with essential contacts; sun protection in bright conditions.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn for the best weather, though the trail can be walked year-round with suitable clothing.

seo.title: Dudley Public Art Heritage Trail (Wolverton Road Trail) – Easy 2.6 km Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 2.6 km Dudley Public Art Heritage Trail along Wolverton Road. An easy, family-friendly urban walk in the UK showcasing public art and local heritage.
